Class StreetLinkedList

java.lang.Object
StreetLinkedList
public class StreetLinkedList extends Object
implementation of the Street Container by using single Linked List

      public boolean isStreetFull(Buildings that)
      Control method for Street if street is full with buildings or buildings don't fit in Street method returns true; return false in other conditions
      Parameters:
      that - Building instance which will be checked by method
      Returns:
      true or false according to the method output
